Perceptor:

"Proces will ends soon "said Perceptor while he turned on 
BlackFortress defences that started to openfire against minions. 
after he had done that Perceptor opened his com link and said "To 
all Preds whose are inside and around Pred base: We're under attack 
it's time to stop those junk for one time of all"

After that anounce he looked to Azure and said "WE have to start to 
work with later when those old rusty metal pieces becomes history... 
we haven't time to loose"

Perceptor left the base and opened fire against Ragebomber






--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> Chimera heard the order, but something caught his eye in the sky. 
> Panicked, Leo took control and called Hydras.
> 
> Chimera: Negatives! NEGATIVES! THE BAD BOTS COME! THEY WANT TO 
TEARS 
> US AND RIPS US APART, YES! but we won't lets them... we will 
Wrench 
> their puny bolts out of their circuits... we will DEVOURS THEM! 
> YAARGH!!!!!!!!!!
> 
> In beast mode, Chimera took flight and got ready to welcome the 
> Minions as they approached Predacon base.
> 
> In vehicle mode, Ragebomber targetted the base and fired many 
small 
> concussion bombs on it.
> 
> Ragebomber: Sky-Eye, dispatch and find Bloodblade!
> 
> Immediately, the diminutive Sky-Eye zoomed away and left the group 
> to its dirty work.
> 
> Firewhip: Now we get to slay them for good! How I waited this 
moment!
> 
> The four remaining Minions landed and transformed in Robot mode, 
> Ragebomber a huge and purple Bot, Klash ready to use his various 
> techniques, Crumblefish patiently charging his two beam weapons 
and 
> Firewhip waiting for the Preds to move...
>

Moon's

> > > Earth. He zoomed his malevolent attention on the three

> > > bases and decided that these were the objectives. A low roar 
> arose 
> > > as he began to speak. His voice would be transmitted all over 
> the 
> > > planet.
> > > 
> > > Unicron: I claim this planet as mine. Any Transformer on it 
will 
> > be 
> > > destroyed unless they choose to become my servants. Also, if 
you

his

they
